body:
Likely also fixes #20088 @vvolkl @alalazo 
Before this fix:
```shell
[aweits@localhost spack]$ spack solve tulip
==> Error: 'SingleValuedVariant' object has no attribute 'append'
```
afterward:
```shell
[aweits@localhost spack]$ spack solve tulip
==> Best of 0 answers.
==> Optimization: [0, 0, -2, 40, -1, 2, -129, 1, 0, -89, 0]
tulip@5.4.0%gcc@9.3.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos8-skylake_avx512
    ^cmake@3.19.0%gcc@9.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos8-skylake_avx512
...
```
title: concretizer: try hard to obtain all needed variant_possible_value()'s
